segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, and it's making me feel a bit uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman just keeps drying those dishes, completely unaware of the mess she's making.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the puddle on the floor growing larger and larger, and it's just so unpleasant to look at.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she should really turn off the faucet and clean up the water before it causes any damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, taking cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy standing on that wobbly stool, and it's making me feel even more uncomfortable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't understand how she can't hear the water overflowing or see the children being mischievous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she's completely tuned out from the world around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she snaps out of it soon and takes care of the mess she's made.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just so unpleasant to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR
